9578 src,
9579 dst,
9580 src_origin,
9581 dst_origin,
9582 region,
9583 events,
9584 event);
9585}
9586
9587inline cl_int enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
9588 const Image& src,
9589 const Buffer& dst,
9590 const array<size_type, 3>& src_origin,
9591 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9592 size_type dst_offset,
9593 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9594 Event* event = NULL)
9595{
9596 cl_int error;
9597 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9598
9599 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9600 return error;
9601 }
9602
9603 return queue.enqueueCopyImageToBuffer(
9604 src,
9605 dst,
9606 src_origin,
9607 region,
9608 dst_offset,
9609 events,
9610 event);
9611}
9612
9613inline cl_int enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
9614 const Buffer& src,
9615 const Image& dst,
9616 size_type src_offset,
9617 const array<size_type, 3>& dst_origin,
9618 const array<size_type, 3>& region,
9619 const vector<Event>* events = NULL,
9620 Event* event = NULL)
9621{
9622 cl_int error;
9623 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9624
9625 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9626 return error;
9627 }
9628
9629 return queue.enqueueCopyBufferToImage(
9630 src,
9631 dst,
9632 src_offset,
9633 dst_origin,
9634 region,
9635 events,
9636 event);
9637}
9638
9639
9640inline cl_int flush(void)
9641{
9642 cl_int error;
9643 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9644
9645 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9646 return error;
9647 }
9648
9649 return queue.flush();
9650}
9651
9652inline cl_int finish(void)
9653{
9654 cl_int error;
9655 CommandQueue queue = CommandQueue::getDefault(&error);
9656
9657 if (error != CL_SUCCESS) {
9658 return error;
9659 }
9660
9661
9662 return queue.finish();
9663}
9664
9665class EnqueueArgs
9666{
9667private:
9668 CommandQueue queue_;
9669 const NDRange offset_;
9670 const NDRange global_;
9671 const NDRange local_;
9672 vector<Event> events_;
9673
9674 template<typename... Ts>
9675 friend class KernelFunctor;
9676
9677public:
9678 EnqueueArgs(NDRange global) :
9679 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9680 offset_(NullRange),
9681 global_(global),
9682 local_(NullRange)
9683 {
9684
9685 }
9686
9687 EnqueueArgs(NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9688 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9689 offset_(NullRange),
9690 global_(global),
9691 local_(local)
9692 {
9693
9694 }
9695
9696 EnqueueArgs(NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9697 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9698 offset_(offset),
9699 global_(global),
9700 local_(local)
9701 {
9702
9703 }
9704
9705 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global) :
9706 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9707 offset_(NullRange),
9708 global_(global),
9709 local_(NullRange)
9710 {
9711 events_.push_back(e);
9712 }
9713
9714 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9715 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9716 offset_(NullRange),
9717 global_(global),
9718 local_(local)
9719 {
9720 events_.push_back(e);
9721 }
9722
9723 EnqueueArgs(Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9724 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9725 offset_(offset),
9726 global_(global),
9727 local_(local)
9728 {
9729 events_.push_back(e);
9730 }
9731
9732 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
9733 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9734 offset_(NullRange),
9735 global_(global),
9736 local_(NullRange),
9737 events_(events)
9738 {
9739
9740 }
9741
9742 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9743 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9744 offset_(NullRange),
9745 global_(global),
9746 local_(local),
9747 events_(events)
9748 {
9749
9750 }
9751
9752 EnqueueArgs(const vector<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9753 queue_(CommandQueue::getDefault()),
9754 offset_(offset),
9755 global_(global),
9756 local_(local),
9757 events_(events)
9758 {
9759
9760 }
9761
9762 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global) :
9763 queue_(queue),
9764 offset_(NullRange),
9765 global_(global),
9766 local_(NullRange)
9767 {
9768
9769 }
9770
9771 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9772 queue_(queue),
9773 offset_(NullRange),
9774 global_(global),
9775 local_(local)
9776 {
9777
9778 }
9779
9780 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9781 queue_(queue),
9782 offset_(offset),
9783 global_(global),
9784 local_(local)
9785 {
9786
9787 }
9788
9789 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global) :
9790 queue_(queue),
9791 offset_(NullRange),
9792 global_(global),
9793 local_(NullRange)
9794 {
9795 events_.push_back(e);
9796 }
9797
9798 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9799 queue_(queue),
9800 offset_(NullRange),
9801 global_(global),
9802 local_(local)
9803 {
9804 events_.push_back(e);
9805 }
9806
9807 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, Event e, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9808 queue_(queue),
9809 offset_(offset),
9810 global_(global),
9811 local_(local)
9812 {
9813 events_.push_back(e);
9814 }
9815
9816 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global) :
9817 queue_(queue),
9818 offset_(NullRange),
9819 global_(global),
9820 local_(NullRange),
9821 events_(events)
9822 {
9823
9824 }
9825
9826 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9827 queue_(queue),
9828 offset_(NullRange),
9829 global_(global),
9830 local_(local),
9831 events_(events)
9832 {
9833
9834 }
9835
9836 EnqueueArgs(CommandQueue &queue, const vector<Event> &events, NDRange offset, NDRange global, NDRange local) :
9837 queue_(queue),
9838 offset_(offset),
9839 global_(global),
9840 local_(local),
9841 events_(events)
9842 {
9843
9844 }
9845};
9846
9847
9848//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9849
9850
9851/**
9852 * Type safe kernel functor.
9853 *
9854 */
9855template<typename... Ts>
9856class KernelFunctor
9857{
9858private:
9859 Kernel kernel_;
9860
9861 template<int index, typename T0, typename... T1s>
9862 void setArgs(T0&& t0, T1s&&... t1s)
9863 {
9864 kernel_.setArg(index, t0);
9865 setArgs<index + 1, T1s...>(std::forward<T1s>(t1s)...);
9866 }
9867
9868 template<int index, typename T0>
9869 void setArgs(T0&& t0)
9870 {
9871 kernel_.setArg(index, t0);
9872 }
9873
9874 template<int index>
9875 void setArgs()
9876 {
9877 }
9878
9879
9880public:
9881 KernelFunctor(Kernel kernel) : kernel_(kernel)
9882 {}
9883
9884 KernelFunctor(
9885 const Program& program,
9886 const string name,
9887 cl_int * err = NULL) :
9888 kernel_(program, name.c_str(), err)
9889 {}
9890
9891 //! \brief Return type of the functor
9892 typedef Event result_type;
9893
9894 /**
9895 * Enqueue kernel.
9896 * @param args Launch parameters of the kernel.
9897 * @param t0... List of kernel arguments based on the template type of the functor.
9898 */
9899 Event operator() (
9900 const EnqueueArgs& args,
9901 Ts... ts)
9902 {
9903 Event event;
9904 setArgs<0>(std::forward<Ts>(ts)...);
9905
9906 args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
9907 kernel_,
9908 args.offset_,
9909 args.global_,
9910 args.local_,
9911 &args.events_,
9912 &event);
9913
9914 return event;
9915 }
9916
9917 /**
9918 * Enqueue kernel with support for error code.
9919 * @param args Launch parameters of the kernel.
9920 * @param t0... List of kernel arguments based on the template type of the functor.
9921 * @param error Out parameter returning the error code from the execution.
9922 */
9923 Event operator() (
9924 const EnqueueArgs& args,
9925 Ts... ts,
9926 cl_int &error)
9927 {
9928 Event event;
9929 setArgs<0>(std::forward<Ts>(ts)...);
9930
9931 error = args.queue_.enqueueNDRangeKernel(
9932 kernel_,
9933 args.offset_,
9934 args.global_,
9935 args.local_,
9936 &args.events_,
9937 &event);
9938
9939 return event;
9940 }
9941
9942#if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9943 cl_int setSVMPointers(const vector<void*> &pointerList)
9944 {
9945 return kernel_.setSVMPointers(pointerList);
9946 }
9947
9948 template<typename T0, typename... T1s>
9949 cl_int setSVMPointers(const T0 &t0, T1s &... ts)
9950 {
9951 return kernel_.setSVMPointers(t0, ts...);
9952 }
9953#endif // #if CL_HPP_TARGET_OPENCL_VERSION >= 200
9954
9955 Kernel getKernel()
9956 {
9957 return kernel_;
9958 }
9959};
9960
9961namespace compatibility {
9962 /**
9963 * Backward compatibility class to ensure that cl.hpp code works with cl2.hpp.
9964 * Please use KernelFunctor directly.
9965 */
9966 template<typename... Ts>
9967 struct make_kernel
9968 {
9969 typedef KernelFunctor<Ts...> FunctorType;
9970
9971 FunctorType functor_;
9972
9973 make_kernel(
9974 const Program& program,
9975 const string name,
9976 cl_int * err = NULL) :
9977 functor_(FunctorType(program, name, err))
9978 {}
9979
9980 make_kernel(
9981 const Kernel kernel) :
9982 functor_(FunctorType(kernel))
9983 {}
9984
9985 //! \brief Return type of the functor
9986 typedef Event result_type;
9987
9988 //! \brief Function signature of kernel functor with no event dependency.
9989 typedef Event type_(
9990 const EnqueueArgs&,
9991 Ts...);
9992
9993 Event operator()(
9994 const EnqueueArgs& enqueueArgs,
9995 Ts... args)
9996 {
9997 return functor_(
9998 enqueueArgs, args...);
9999 }
10000 };
10001} // namespace compatibility
10002
10003
